programme.desc: Cincinnati Bengals (4-8) at Dallas Cowboys (5-7). From ATandT Stadium. Cowboys QB Cooper Rush is now 7-3 for his career as a starter, including a win over QB Joe Burrow (NFL-best 278 ypg) and Cincy in 2022.

programme.title: The Agency
programme.desc: Dr. Blake arrives from Langley and is put to a test by Martian and Henry. A spooked source threatens to put an operation at risk. Dannys cover is put in play. Martian, overtaken by events, begins to question Samis motives.

programme.title: The Agency
programme.desc: Henry questions Martians thinking. Bosko is briefed by Langley on a top-secret operation. Poppy makes a startling discovery. Martian confronts Sami about why shes in London and finds a needle in a haystack, before a heated session with Dr. Blake.

programme.title: The Agency

programme.title: Lioness
programme.desc: Despite Joes weakened state, the team is forced back to Iraq to make a point.

programme.title: The Agency
programme.desc: Henry questions Martians thinking. Bosko is briefed by Langley on a top-secret operation. Poppy makes a startling discovery. Martian confronts Sami about why shes in London and finds a needle in a haystack, before a heated session with Dr. Blake.

programme.title: Outlaw Posse (2024)
programme.desc: When an outlaw learns that a fortune in Civil War-era gold was hidden by the Confederacy, he puts together a team to find and retrieve it. Learning about his plan, the outlaws estranged son seeks out his father to get in on the job and try to restore his life to what it once was.

programme.title: Dead for a Dollar (2022)
programme.desc: The western centers on bounty hunter Max Borlund and his fateful confrontation with lifelong nemesis Joe Cribbens. Borlund ventures into Mexico to pursue the kidnapped wife of a wealthy man. But on his journey, he reunites with Cribbens years after he sent him to jail.

programme.title: One Life (2023)
programme.desc: This drama is based on the true story of Sir Nicholas Winton and his heroic deeds during World War II. As a young British broker, he traveled to Prague in 1938, three months after the war broke out. He found destitute Jews who fled Nazi persecution in Austria and Germany. Families were willing to send their children away before the borders closed. Nicholas helps them ship the children out. But in his older years, he is haunted by the thought that he didnt do enough to help more children.

programme.title: Contagion (2011)
programme.desc: In this ensemble thriller about a virus that quickly becomes a global pandemic, a husband copes with the sudden death of his wife, while a doctor puts herself at risk to find a cure and an activist blogger stokes societys paranoia.

programme.title: Foxcatcher (2014)
programme.desc: Docudrama about millionaire John du Pont, who fatally shot Olympic gold-medal wrestler Dave Schultz and proceeded to lock himself in his mansion for two days as the police attempted to negotiate with him.

programme.title: Joyeux Noel (2005)
programme.desc: Scottish, French and German troops declare a spontaneous Christmas Eve truce in the trenches of World War I.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood (2007)
programme.desc: An opportunistic, self-made oil tycoon transforms into a corrupt businessman in this turn-of-the-20th-century story about money and greed.

programme.title: The Honey Trap: A True Story of Love, Lies, and the FBI (2024)
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the story of Denis Cuspert, aka Deso Dogg, and his journey from infamous German rapper to ISIS recruiter. Layering unexpected subjects, director Chris Moukarbel explores the circular relationship between propaganda, recruitment and the soft power of entertainment culture interwoven with an affair between Cuspert and the FBI translator assigned to investigate him.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan (1998)
programme.desc: A US Army captain leads a mission to rescue a GI trapped behind enemy lines in France on D-Day after all three of the soldiers brothers are killed in action. As the search commences, the close-knit squad sets out through areas still thick with Nazis.

programme.title: The Agency
programme.desc: Henry questions Martians thinking. Bosko is briefed by Langley on a top-secret operation. Poppy makes a startling discovery. Martian confronts Sami about why shes in London and finds a needle in a haystack, before a heated session with Dr. Blake.

programme.title: Lioness
programme.desc: Operation Sky Hawk is a go as Kaitlyn and Westfield pressure Pablo to side with them.

programme.title: Killing Eve
programme.Sub-title: I Dont Want to Be Free
programme.desc: Tensions are running high as the situation in Moscow escalates, and Eve starts to question who she can trust. Despite the danger, with her sights firmly set on Villanelle, Eve goes rogue. With both women under pressure, the stakes are higher than ever.

programme.title: The Agency
programme.desc: Henry questions Martians thinking. Bosko is briefed by Langley on a top-secret operation. Poppy makes a startling discovery. Martian confronts Sami about why shes in London and finds a needle in a haystack, before a heated session with Dr. Blake.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street (2013)
programme.desc: A young financial whiz has a meteoric rise in the business world, but falls victim to a life of hedonistic excess and greed.

programme.title: Wild Things (1998)
programme.desc: Twists lurk in every corner of this steamy potboiler about a teacher involved in a dangerous scheme in which no one is who they appear to be.

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You (2014)
programme.desc: An adaptation of Jonathan Troppers novel surrounding a dysfunctional family reunion following their fathers funeral.

programme.title: Risky Business (1983)
programme.desc: A teenager turns his house into a brothel while his parents are away in this sharp comedy highlighted by Cruises star-making performance.

programme.title: Coach Carter (2005)
programme.desc: Samuel L. Jackson brings his A-game to this inspiring and eloquent fact-based sports drama. He plays a no-nonsense California high-school basketball coach who demands that his cocky, undisciplined players be responsible on and off the court. Rob Brown, Robert Richard, Debbi Morgan, Ashanti, Rick Gonzalez, Antwon Tanner, Nana Gbewonyo, Denise Dowse, Mel Winkler.

programme.title: The Lincoln Lawyer (2011)
programme.desc: Ethically challenged lawyer Mickey lands a high-profile case defending a spoilt young man accused of murder, but he soon discovers hell need to keep his wits about him to get through the case alive.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible (1996)
programme.desc: A crack team of spies try to determine who sabotaged a mission to find crucial computer information.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II (2000)
programme.desc: IMF agent Ethan Hunt takes on a renegade spy whos stolen a deadly high-tech virus.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III (2006)
programme.desc: Retired super-spy Ethan Hunt is called back into action to battle a ruthless arms dealer.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol (2011)
programme.desc: When the Kremlin is bombed and the blame falls on the Impossible Mission Force, Ethan Hunt assembles a new team to uncover the truth by using every high-tech trick in the book.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible (1996)
programme.desc: A crack team of spies try to determine who sabotaged a mission to find crucial computer information.

programme.desc: Henry questions Martians thinking. Bosko is briefed by Langley on a top-secret operation. Poppy makes a startling discovery. Martian confronts Sami about why shes in London and finds a needle in a haystack, before a heated session with Dr. Blake.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in America (1984)
programme.desc: Sergio Leones epic chronicles the rise and fall of Jewish mobsters in Brooklyn over 50 years. Robert De Niro, James Woods. Deborah: Elizabeth McGovern. ODonnell: Treat Williams. Carol: Tuesday Weld. Joe: Burt Young. Frankie: Joe Pesci.

programme.title: Coach Carter (2005)
programme.desc: Samuel L. Jackson brings his A-game to this inspiring and eloquent fact-based sports drama. Rob Brown, Robert Richard, Debbi Morgan, Ashanti, Rick Gonzalez, Antwon Tanner, Nana Gbewonyo, Denise Dowse, Mel Winkler.

programme.title: The Firm (1993)
programme.desc: A young lawyer discovers the firm hes hired into is controlled by the mob and attempts to escape from their clutches.

programme.title: John Grishams The Rainmaker (1997)
programme.desc: In this gripping adaptation, a naive young lawyer and his experienced partner take on a corrupt insurance company in the court case of a lifetime.

programme.desc: The true story of Dream Alliance, an unlikely racehorse bred by bartender Jan Vokes. With very little money and no experience, Jan convinces her neighbors to chip in their meager earnings to help raise Dream and compete with the racing elites.

programme.title: Mafia Mamma
programme.desc: A mild-mannered suburban mom unexpectedly inherits her late grandfather's mafia empire in Italy. Guided by the firm's trusted consigliere, she hilariously defies everyone's expectations as she finds herself stuck in the middle of a deadly mob war.

programme.title: Chantilly Bridge
programme.desc: A group of lifelong, steadfast female friends confront old resentments, celebrate new milestones and rediscover their unbreakable bond.

programme.title: Tale of Tales
programme.desc: Three fairy tales revolve around a king (John C. Reilly) who must slay a sea monster, a giant flea and a womanizing ruler (Vincent Cassel) who's in for a surprise.

programme.title: Echo in the Canyon
programme.desc: A look at how musical groups such as The Byrds, The Beach Boys, Buffalo Springfield, and The Mamas & the Papas birthed the beginnings of the Laurel Canyon music scene and how the echo of these artists' creations reverberated across the world.

programme.title: Jules
programme.desc: A man's quiet life gets upended when a UFO crashes in his backyard in rural Pennsylvania. As he befriends the mysterious extraterrestrial, things start to get complicated when two neighbors discover it and the government quickly closes in.

programme.title: Jules
programme.desc: A man's quiet life gets upended when a UFO crashes in his backyard in rural Pennsylvania. As he befriends the mysterious extraterrestrial, things start to get complicated when two neighbors discover it and the government quickly closes in.

programme.title: The Baxter
programme.desc: A quintessentially nice guy (Michael Showalter) spends two weeks ridden with anxiety before his wedding.

programme.title: The Uninvited
programme.desc: A ghost prompts a lethal battle of wills between a man's new fiancee (Elizabeth Banks) and his two daughters (Emily Browning, Arielle Kebbel), one of whom has just returned from a mental ward.

programme.title: A Promise
programme.desc: In the early 20th century, a love triangle forms between an ailing factory owner, his young bride and his protege.

programme.title: Memory
programme.desc: Social worker Sylvia's structured life is blown apart when Saul follows her home from their high school reunion. Their surprise encounter profoundly impacts both of them as they open the door to the past.

programme.title: Ali & Ava
programme.desc: Two lonely people develop a deep connection despite the lingering legacy of their past relationships.

programme.title: 45 Years
programme.desc: As their 45th wedding anniversary approaches, a woman (Charlotte Rampling) learns that her husband (Tom Courtenay) was once engaged to someone else.

programme.title: Past Lives
programme.desc: Nora and Hae Sung, two deeply connected childhood friends, are wrest apart after Nora's family emigrates from South Korea. Decades later, they are reunited for one fateful week as they confront destiny, love and the choices that make a life.

programme.title: Treasure
programme.desc: A music journalist accompanies her father, a charmingly stubborn Holocaust survivor, on a journey to his homeland. While she's eager to make sense of her family's past, her dad has an agenda of his own.

programme.title: The Hours
programme.desc: The writings of Virginia Woolf (Nicole Kidman) affect a housewife (Julianne Moore) and emulate the life of a New Yorker (Meryl Streep) who is in love with a dying poet.

programme.title: Carol
programme.desc: Aspiring photographer Therese spots the beautiful, elegant Carol perusing the doll displays in a 1950s Manhattan department store. The two women develop a fast bond that becomes a love with complicated consequences.

programme.title: All the World Is Sleeping
programme.desc: A young mother in New Mexico sinks deeper into addiction while struggling to care for her daughter.

programme.title: This One's for the Ladies
programme.desc: Hundreds of enthusiastic women gather for a potluck celebration to cheer on Tyga, Raw Dawg, Sweet Tea and other male strippers in Newark, N.J.

programme.title: Extra Ordinary
programme.desc: A woman who has supernatural abilities must save a possessed girl.

programme.title: The Uninvited

programme.title: Nothing Compares

programme.title: You Hurt My Feelings
programme.desc: A novelist's long-standing marriage is suddenly upended when she overhears her husband give his honest reaction to her latest book.

programme.title: Clouds of Sils Maria
programme.desc: A veteran actress (Juliette Binoche) comes face-to-face with an uncomfortable reflection of herself when she agrees to take part in a revival of the play that launched her career 20 years earlier.

programme.title: It Could Happen to You
programme.desc: A New York policeman (Nicolas Cage) keeps his promise to split a $4 million lottery prize with a waitress (Bridget Fonda), but his wife objects.

programme.title: Failure to Launch
programme.desc: The parents of a young man (Matthew McConaughey) who still lives at home hire a beautiful woman (Sarah Jessica Parker) to entice him to finally leave the nest.

programme.title: The Ex
programme.desc: A chronic underachiever (Zach Braff) takes a job at his father-in-law's advertising firm and locks horns with his wife's (Amanda Peet) paraplegic former lover (Jason Bateman).

programme.title: You Hurt My Feelings
programme.desc: A novelist's long-standing marriage is suddenly upended when she overhears her husband give his honest reaction to her latest book.

programme.title: Anesthesia
programme.desc: The lives of a self-destructive student (Kristen Stewart), a hard-drinking housewife (Gretchen Mol) and an impoverished junkie (K. Todd Freeman) are linked to the brutal attack of a Columbia University philosophy professor (Sam Waterston).

programme.title: Comet
programme.desc: A cynical lad (Justin Long) and a young woman (Emmy Rossum) begin a 6-year relationship after meeting by chance during a meteor shower.

programme.title: The Boy

programme.title: It Could Happen to You
programme.desc: A New York policeman (Nicolas Cage) keeps his promise to split a $4 million lottery prize with a waitress (Bridget Fonda), but his wife objects.

programme.title: The Baby-Sitters Club
programme.desc: Seven girls balance the growing pains of adolescence with the demands of operating a daycare camp for children.

programme.title: Clueless

programme.title: Maggie's Plan
